name: Spork Marketing
tag_list: search-engine-marketing, search-engine-optimization, denver-internet-marketing, automotive-internet-marketing, blog-maintenance, blog-design, social-marketing
overview:
Denver-based Spork Marketing specializes in managing and creating simple, efficient, and effective online marketing campaigns.

Spork Marketing provides internet marketing and consulting services, including search engine marketing and optimization, social marketing, web design, blog design and blog maintenance, automotive marketing services, and more.

Spork specializes in providing services to the small and medium-sized business.
